div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222585009 (American Joint Committee on Cancer clinical T category allowable value (qualifier value))
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222589003 (American Joint Committee on Cancer pathological T category allowable value (qualifier value))
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222595002 (American Joint Committee on Cancer ypT category allowable value (qualifier value))

title.value: TNM Primary Tumor Category Value Set

publisher.value: IDG Institut für digitale Gesundheitsdaten RLP gGmbH

name.value: IDG Institut für digitale Gesundheitsdaten RLP gGmbH

description.value: Result values for T category. This value set contains SNOMED-CT equivalents of UICC codes for the T category, according to TNM staging rules.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement
